The correct order is: (1) A tablet close-up shows a February 2017 calendar with a "Route Time Saver" feature. (2) An orange on-screen overlay reads "DON'T FORGET TO SUBSCRIBE" during the woman's interview. (3) A computer screen displays a "Scope It" report labeled "1 of 18". (4) The woman says 24% of claims get reassigned and mentions firms adopting Scopeit. (5) She describes the NACA convention and then says "Question of the day". (6) The man in the kitchen appears with on-screen text "QUESTION OF THE DAY". (7) A "Next Up:" graphic shows with a blue banner urging viewers to subscribe.

Therefore, the answer is A: 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 4 -> 5 -> 7 -> 6.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on television for help. In this video, the correct order is: (1) The male host jokes that she "forgot the finger" after Rebecca’s first "You’re watching Adjuster TV" read. (2)调整器电视的主题音乐开始播放，厨房主持人介绍了调整器电视，并邀请观众订阅。 (3) YouTube界面出现，显示“您作为调解人[在2019年相关]！”有1700个观看次数。 (4) Rebecca介绍自己是Scheduleit的创始人兼首席执行官。 (5)她建议每个索赔预算10美元，以便加入一家公司的名册。 (6)她解释说，范围笔记会自动上传，照片会从一月份会议的发布中自动标记。 (7)她敦促询问导师你不知道什么问题，请问。

Therefore, the answer is (B).
